name: LiLa Inn & Motorbike Tours Ha Giang
address: 113 Nguyen Trai, Ha Giang, Hà Giang, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Hà Giang, LiLa Inn & Motorbike Tours Ha Giang có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên, cùng Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ. Ngoài bếp chung, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân chơi trẻ em. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tại khách sạn, tất cả các phòng đều có ban công. Phòng tắm chung được trang bị bồn tắm và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí. Tất cả các căn tại LiLa Inn & Motorbike Tours Ha Giang có điều hòa và bàn làm việc.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, món chay hoặc món thuần chay cho bữa sáng.

Khách có thể chơi trò phi tiêu tại chỗ nghỉ. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê xe đạp và dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt, đội ngũ nhân viên luôn túc trực 24/7 tại lễ tân.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách LiLa Inn & Motorbike Tours Ha Giang 146 km.

review.comment_positive: Thank you Forest for helping me out, all the things, you are super, you made my trip!!!. Everyone needs you. Very good bike, good food. Comfortable large common space
review.comment_negative: The previous guests eating in rooms cause of ants coming

review.comment_positive: The room was clean, the internet was good, everyone was super friendly and you get all the help you need to organize your trip to Ha Giang Loop. You can even leave your luggage there. Ted was especially friendly.

Comfortable room for the night. The best part of the stay was the motorcycle tour on the Ha Giang Loop and guides our host, Liem, set us up with. We were a small group of 4 and our guides made sure we were very well taken care of. Definitely a trip highlight!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Không gian chung của khách sạn khá sạch sẽ và thoáng. Dễ chịu.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Das neue, moderne Haus ist sehr sauber und die Betten sind bequem. Grosse, gemütliche Räume. Der Host ist extrem hilfsbereit und macht alles für seine Gäste. Wirklich herausragende Gastfreundschaft.
review.comment_negative: Zur Zeit war kaum jemand dort, daher nicht allzu sozial, aber mit dem Host hat man gute Gespräche.

review.comment_positive: Prima locatie
review.comment_negative: Ontzettend gehorig, staat slechts een houten wandje tussen de kamers. Tevens waren de ramen niet goed af te sluiten waardoor we erg veel muggen hadden. We wilden de Ha Giang Loop regelen via dit hostel maar de dame in kwestie bleef er erg vaag over waardoor we uiteindelijk via een ander hostel geboekt hebben..

review.rating: perfect voor de start van de ha giang loop!
review.comment_positive: perfect om te verblijven als start van de ha giang loop. ze geven een goede uitleg en bieden scooterverhuur aan. je mag je spullen daar achterlaten en voor je vertrekt een heerlijk ontbijtje eten.
review.comment_negative: kamers zien niet fantastisch maar gewoon goed!

review.comment_positive: L'accueil était super, nous avons bien mangé et bu pour pas cher, on a même eu des fruits et cocktails offerts. La chambre était top, le lit confortable. Séjour parfait !

The Host (Lila) is a very kind person, we felt very welcomed at the homestay. Lila helped us organize everything for the Ha Giang Loop. She gave us two very new motorbikes and good suggestions for the Loop. 

We stayed there the night before the loop and the night after and Lila also organized us a bus ticket to Ha Long bay. 

The rooms are very comfortable and clean. If we come back to Ha Giang, we would definitely choose Lila's Homestay again!

review.comment_negative: Hat den Standort gewechselt, aktuell alles im Umbau, unorganisiert und eher schmuddlig. Im Zimmer und in den Handtüchern fremde Haare. Beim check-in zuerst zwei belegte/ nicht gereinigte Zimmer zugewiesen.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Hạng Bình Dân

review.comment_positive: The staff is very friendly and helpful. They made our stay, as well as the tour of the loop a very memorable experience.

review.rating: Point de départ pour la boucle de Ha Giang à moto, prix imbattable, et il faut surtout mettre à l’honneur Lan, la formid

review.comment_positive: Giá cả khá hợp lý so với chất lượng phòng. Gia đình tôi hài lòng.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Wir haben die Unterkunft empfohlen bekommen, besonders weil wir hierüber auch die Tour zum Ha Giang Loop buchen konnten. Die Zimmer sind sauber und groß. Duschen und Toiletten sind in Ordnung. Abends wurden wir zu einem Dinner in der Unterkunft eingeladen, was sehr lecker war. Die Tour in den darauffolgenden Tagen war wirklich ein Traum, alles war top organisiert unser Guide Stephan hat sehr gutes englisch gesprochen. Wir waren nur zu dritt in der Gruppe unterwegs und haben uns zu jedem Moment sicher gefühlt. Die Unterkünfte und das Essen unterwegs waren auch gut ausgewählt.
Gute Beratung für die Rollertour und gute Rollervermietung. Sehr nettes Personal.
review.comment_negative: Die Zimmer sind sehr hellhörig und könnten etwas sauberer sein. Für eine Nacht zur Anreise in Ordnung.

Tony and Liam were SO helpful and nice and we can't thank them enough for helping us feel comfortable on our motorbikes! Trip of a lifetime and we appreciate their hospitality and kindness. Thank you staff of Lila Inn! We appreciate you all so much!
Greta location, really friendly staff.

review.comment_positive: The staff were super helpful. rented a good quality scooter from them and Liam gave excellent tips for the loop and helped arranged bud transfers

review.rating: Over exceeding expectations of the famous Hi Giang loop, a beautiful team and lovely stay.
review.comment_positive: Great staff, always helpful kind and accommodating to questions. We did the 3 day 2 night tour which was unbelievable. From my initial contact with Laim and his team all the way until the end the experience was unforgettable. A lot of careful thought has gone into the route and home stays to be special for the small tours with the guides. They are also very good at helping with information for onward travel. Always the rooms had been lovely, beds very comfortable, good amazing and staff wonderful :-) would recommend to anyone looking for a real experience with local people.

review.rating: Highly recommend to travellers doing the loop!
review.comment_positive: This was the perfect place to stay before starting our trip around the Ha Giang loop. We were able to rent our bikes through Lila which were both new and in great condition. The staff are super helpful and provide all the tips you need if you are planning on doing the loop without a tour guide. We booked a private room which was warm and comfortable and breakfast in the morning was nice.

review.rating: Would recommend for doing Ha Giang Loop. Comfortable, private stay.
review.comment_positive: Centrally located. Offered good bike for Ha Giang Loop. Owner is hospitable. Provided information about the loop. Room was private and clean. Bed was really comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Bike rental prices slightly higher compared to other places in town. Laundry service was very quick but expensive and laundry came out smelling funny. Food is a bit expensive.

review.rating: perfect place to start/organize the Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: very nice staff, that helps with everything!
review.comment_negative: in the rooms are a few things that can be improved

review.comment_positive: Liam was very kind and helped us to book a Ha Giang Loop trip with short notice for the next day. The tour was great - we were only a group of 4 on the first day, the other days just the two of us and had a great driver (thanks Minh!).
review.comment_negative:
The entrance/common area downstairs was a bit chaotic and did not invite to spend time outside of the room. 
The room was OK, very simple and not completely clean with some dirty corners and spiders webs. 

It was sufficient and convenient to stay the one night before the trip, but we would not have stayed longer.

review.comment_positive: Chúng tôi hài lòng với sự sạch sẽ và tiện nghi cơ bản của phòng.
el personal era agradable
review.comment_negative: Ls camas eran muy incómodas

review.comment_positive: Phòng ngủ khá yên tĩnh, chúng tôi đã có những giấc ngủ ngon.

review.rating: Great place to stay and to rent a tour
review.comment_positive:
Owner is very nice, friendly and helpful. He answer on million questions from me :)
We rented motorbike in this place. Price us the best in town! Bikes are new, absolutely no issues with them: just add petrol and drive :)
We didn't know that you can rent tour here. Liam, owner, seems very knowledgeable about Ha Giang area, he told us many interesting things. But unfortunately we already planned our trip, booked hotels, etc., so we didn't have chance to participate in his tours. Probably, next time :)
Hotel is located on small street, far from main traffic. So, it is not noisy at all. The only disadvantage is not perfect noise isolation between rooms, but for us it was not the issue (though I'm very sensitive to noise). Also Liam gives you earplugs for free, so it should not be an issue at all.
Though it is located on small street, area with lots of restaurants is in a walkable distance.
Highly recommend!

review.rating: Perfect place to start Ha Giang loop
review.comment_positive:
The bus from Sa Pa left us in front of the hotel, and the bus to go to Ninh Bình picked up us directly in the hotel.
Lila rent semi automatic scooters for 180k per day and 5$ insurance per day, she helped us A LOT following us at 6.30am to make sure we had no problem on the road. Perfect place to start the Ha Giang 3 days loop, they even have a shower when you come back!

review.rating: Amazing accommodation to start an even more amazing tour through the Ha Giang Loop.
review.comment_positive:
We spontaneously decided to book a tour for the Ha Giang Loop with LiLa Inn and it was so worth it! Liam is extremely friendly and helpful. Not only did he organize everything extremely short-term, but also helped with bus tickets and any other concerns we had. The tour itself was also amazing! Being just the two of us and not in a group of 20 people which we often saw along the way, our guides were careful drivers and took us places not many other tourists went. 
LiLa Inn is simple but nice. We were invited for a joint dinner, got breakfast together and the room we stayed in was also nice.
Can highly recommend, especially booking a tour for the Ha Giang Loop! Will definitely come back when we are in Ha Giang again.
Via het hostel mooie nieuwe scooters gehuurd voor de loop. De host was super aardig en heeft ons goed geholpen met het plannen van de loop en ons vervoer naar de volgende bestemming

super freundlich und günstig
kind staff

Nice room, clean.

We had an amazing stay at Lila Inn!! It’s been one of the best hostels we’ve stayed at and that’s largely down to the staff. Lan, Forrest, and everyone at Lila Inn went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and did whatever they could to help us. They are some of the nicest people around. We unfortunately lost our passports during the Ha Giang Loop and Lan helped us throughout it all and even sent them back to us in Hanoi once they were found!! We were so grateful for their help! The rooms were super comfortable too and you can rent bikes from them to do the loop. The bikes are new and in great condition. You can also organise transport to your next destination with them for a good price. Would 100% recommend staying at Lila Inn!

review.rating: Amazing staff, really lovely hostel and excellent advice for the Ha Giang loop
review.comment_positive: The staff here are absolutely amazing. Every single member of staff is super friendly and our easy rider Ninh was fantastic. They run small group tours but also rent bikes and just give you advice. I took an easy rider and my friend rode his own bike and they were super flexible about us changing our plans and picking up other friends on the way. The hostel itself is clean and comfortable and a great place to stay before and after your trip.

Liam is a really good host and took care of everything. We booked a 2 nights tour with him with two easy drivers and everything went well! During the tour we stayed in the best home stays and had amazing food! They took us to hidden places away from the tourists! We were really lucky to have this arranged by him as you can really customised it on your needs. He also booked our buses and everything was via WhatsApp easily. 

Thank you for everything!

review.rating: Von hier aus solltest du unbedingt in den Ha Giang Loop starten.
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft ist ein super Ausgangspunkt für den Ha Giang Loop.
Die Zimmer sind sauber und der Besitzer ist super nett und hilfsbereit. Wir haben über ihn eine 4-tägige Tour mit tollen Easy Ridern gebucht und konnten unser Gepäck für die Zeit im Lila Inn lassen.

review.comment_positive: I could not recommend this place enough! The room was lovely and clean, the facilities were good but most importantly the staff were amazing. Especially the lady who owns the place, she could not have been more helpful when helping us plan the Ha Giang Loop, but also helped us with other things such as bus transfers. She was kind and welcoming and a lovely person inside and out.
Great, the owner helps with everything(shame we didn’t meet him in personal). We rented a motorcycle there, they also arranged our retur to Hanoi. All without any issues.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Ha Giang!
review.comment_positive: Lila is the best place to stay before your Ha Giang Loop tour! We booked the 3 day 2 night tour upon arrival and Liem helped us with everything so it was a seamless process. The tour was just 4 of us, much nicer than the huge groups you see driving around. We stayed at excellent homestays and all food was included. Lila itself is very comfortable and I would happily stay here again. They also hosted dinner every night for no additional cost. Thank you Liem and everyone at Lila for our best experience in Vietnam!!
Nhân viên khá thân thiện và sẵn lòng chỉ dẫn. Cả nhóm hài lòng.

We had an amazing experience staying at LiLa Inn. Liam provided outstanding customer service, he was so helpful and communicative. He helped arrange our transport from Hanoi to Ha Giang and also helped arrange our transport to Cat Ba Island after our stay. My partner and I booked a full package easy rider motorbike tour with LiLa Inn for the Ha Giang Loop and had a wonderful time. We felt safe with our easy riders (Ninh & Tao) who took great care of us on the loop from start to finish. The staff at LiLa Inn were great, especially Kim, who made us feel like we were part of the family. We can’t thank Liam enough for all the help during our stay and we highly recommend staying at LiLa Inn for anyone considering doing the loop. On top of all that the room we stayed in was spacious, clean and comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Nothing - we loved everything about our stay at LiLa Inn.

review.comment_positive: staff staff staff and staff again :). motocycle guy was THE BEST, giving us great tips where to stop on the ha giang loop. After we got back from the loop they gave a room for free for couple of hours to rest and take a shower.
review.comment_negative: a bit dirty mattress

review.rating: Excellent start to the Ha Giang Loop, friendly, comfortable, excellent English!
review.comment_positive: Lila Inn was brilliant from the get go. Friendly & comfortable hotel. We arrived at 3am and had been sent a self check in video earlier so we could check in with ease. After a 6 hour bus it was the perfect place to rest, with comfy beds, warm showers with great pressure & peaceful location. Received a warm welcome in the morning with a delicious breakfast. Choice of eggs, sausage & toast or a Vietnamese special. We were then given a quick lesson on the bikes before setting out on the Ha Giang Loop. The staff spoke excellent English and gave a great lesson to us newby’s. Bikes are young in their years & in great condition. Lila Inn was the perfect starting point for the Ha Giang Loop and I would highly recommend staying here. On our return we were also allowed to shower in one of the rooms, and they had already booked our onward travel and helped us make sure we got the coach. I’d give them more than 10 rating if I could!

review.rating: Attentionné, parfait pour commencer la Ha Giang Loop

Ils nous ont loué les scooters et on s'est entraîné avant de partir. Tres pro. Ils ont vraiment été au petit soin. Tout s'est bien déroulé ! Un grand merci !
review.comment_negative: Chambre un peu sommaire mais pour 1 nuit, c'est très bien!

review.rating: Pas de soucis pour organiser la boucle avec Liam notre hôte
review.comment_positive:
La propreté de la chambre , la simplicité pour louer un scooter , le temps pris par notre hôte pour bien nous expliquer la boucle , le formidable accueil de Liam notre hôte et nos échanges comme si on se connaissait depuis longtemps 
Et puis à quelques minutes de marche , les très bons petits plats vietnamien dans les échoppes Je recommande
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive: Không khí trong phòng khá thoáng đãng. Khá dễ chịu.

review.rating: more than just a hotel to sleep. This is motorcycle hire and guided info and an amazing owner who looks after you!
review.comment_positive: Hotel is great and breakfast  is really nice too. For the price it's honestly a really solid option and it's not full of a heap of young backpackers. The real hero is Thuan. Just an absolute legend, organised us motorbikes and sent a Google map itinerary for us to do the loop ourselves. Had proper good helmets and protective gear. Helped us translate in some rural remote towns ( part of his itinerary and it was amazing) his recommendations felt like a really genuine experience not just the touristy areas. At the end of the trip he took me to get money out, booked my bus transfer and even let my partner and I shower before getting on the bus even though we weren't staying at the hotel that night. Excellent service. Thanks heaps Thuan, you made my trip such a memorable experience and I'm really grateful!

The staff were excellent. Nông helped us with bike hire and planning our Ha Giang loop route for best experience and road conditions. Let us shower and refresh after finishing the loop and organised bus back to Hanoi. Can not express how helpful he was.

On aurait aimé un minimum de communication vu la somme demandée.

Con ellos hicimos un tour en moto de tres noches con drivers y fue sensacional. Todo salió perfecto, los hostels donde dormiamos, las motos, los drivers, las montañas, etc. 
Solamente hubo un día que.paramos a comer en un restaurante extremadamente sucio y nos costó comer. Al llegar informamos al gerente y nos dijo que lo solucionaría. 
La verdad que el gerente es un chico que se nota que se preocupa por las personas y le gusta lo que hace. Mil gracias.

The accommodation and loop was an excellent price and we will cherish the momentos for evvvverrrrr! Highly recommend staying here, bikes tour and breakfast sorted by the Inn. Thankyou Lila Inn, Lots of love from Summer and Benjamin.

Würden wir nur die Tour und die Mitarbeiter bewerten, wäre es eine 10 von 10.

Leider waren wir mit der Unterkunft an sich gar nicht zufrieden, da sie sehr schmuddelig war. Die Bettwäsche war nicht frisch (Haare und Speichel auf den Kissen, hat nicht frisch gerochen). Da wir um 22:30 ankamen, konnten wir nicht mehr nach frischer Bettwäsche fragen.
Die Wände waren sehr dünn, sodass es wirklich extrem laut war, selbst für vietnamesische Verhältnisse.
Nachts sind wir aufgewacht, weil wir eine Kakerlake im Bett hatten.

review.rating: Top Location um den Loop zu starten
review.comment_positive: Wir starteten unsere Loop-Tour vom Lila Inn aus. Das Zimmer war ideal für den Beginn unserer Reise. Wir konnten auch ein Motorrad (Honda XR150) mieten, das sich optimal für die Loop-Strecke eignete, besonders wegen der groberen Straßenverhältnisse. So konnten wir auch schwer erreichbare Wasserfälle erkunden. Abschließend half uns das Hotel bei der Buchung des Busses zurück nach Hanoi, der uns direkt nach unserer Rückkehr vom Loop am Hotel abholte.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft hat vor einer Woche ihren Standort gewechselt. Das Haus ist neu gebaut und modern ausgestattet. Der Besitzer ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben über ihn auch eine dreitägige Easy Rider Tour gebucht, die uns sehr gut gefallen hat. Nachdem sich keine weiteren Personen für die gleichen Daten angemeldet hatten, bekamen wir ohne Aufpreis eine private Tour mit zwei sehr lieben Easy Ridern. In den Homestays hatten wir private Zimmer mit eigenem Badezimmer und das Essen war echt gut.
review.comment_negative: Schließfächer wären sehr hilfreich.

review.rating: The room is basic and ok to spend a night or two. But the Lila Inn Ha Giang loop tour was amazing, I highly recommend it

review.comment_positive: Lila Inn gave us cheap and comfortable rooms in a great location in ha giang town. The hosts gave us great advice and helped us book the 4 day ha giang loop motorbike tour including ban gioc waterfall. They also provided one of their own drivers to lead this trip. Ninh was an excellent guide and driver. He ensured we felt safe, welcomed and comfortable. The motorbike tour was one of the most amazing experiences! We highly recommend booking the 4 day ha giang loop including ban gioc waterfall through Lila inn and travel. Everything was perfect :)

review.rating: Perfect accomodation and very good option for the loop
review.comment_positive:
Liam was a perfect host and we did the Easyrider loop with him which we recommend 1000% (it was one of the cheapest options we found and everything was well organised).

The new rooms were also perfect for 2 nights in Ha Giang!
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect

review.rating: I really enjoyed my stay at Safari Hostel Ha Giang. The owners are very friendly and accomodating.
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Hạng Bình Dân
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was good. I had eggs and a baguette. The people at the hostel cooked the food on the spot which was good because the food was warm when I ate it.
review.comment_negative: I had initially booked the hostel at Lila Inn. However, I was told at the last minute that they were fully booked, and they had to allocate me to a different hostel; Safari Hostel Ha Giang.

review.comment_positive: Staff were very accommodating and helpful
Friendly get together at meal times, very informative about Ha Giang area

I can’t say enough good things about LiLa Inn, especially the staff. When we arrived we had the intention of driving the loop ourselves. Being from the USA, we unfortunately did not have the proper license to do. The front desk went over every possibility for us and took 2 hours of their time to figure everything out. They will hold your hand through the process, and that is worth the stay alone. We’re actually staying with them again when we head back to Ha Giang once we’re done with the loop.

review.rating: Perfect for starting and ending the Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: Great spot. Easy to rent motorbike from. We didn’t do a guided tour or group ride of ha Giang and they were supportive in helping us sort it out. Breakfast was lovely too. If I were to do the loop again, I would 100% stay here.

review.rating: Good base for doing Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: Considering only accommodation (not other services) - quite good for the price. Liam was super helpful, I arrived in the room and there was a map for riding a Ha Giang Loop containing even some hand notes - what to visit, homestays, road to take = awesome. Decent wifi. Simple but good breakfast. The fact that basically whole staff speaks English.
review.comment_negative:
The room was OK, but there is almost no sound isolation, which I have been told just at the arrival. You will appreciate earplugs.

There was a broken rack in the room. Sadly no one did anything about it even after immediately telling to staff.

review.comment_positive: The Host is very friendly. We could eat with the other people at the hostel and it was really yummy :) The tour is organised quite nicely.

review.rating: Très bonne adresse à Hà Giang
review.comment_positive: Très bon endroit où passer du temps à Hà Giang. Le cadre est agréable, le hamac et les fauteuils donnent une ambiance chaleureuse et le personnel est aux petits soins. Je recommande.

De gastvrouw Lan was erg vriendelijk en regelde van alles voor ons voor de Ha Giang loop en ook het vervoer op de terugweg. Ook konden we douchen nadat we terug kwamen van de motortocht en voordat we de bus in moesten.
review.comment_negative: De hygiëne in de kamer. De elektriciteitsdraden in de badkamer zaten dichtbij de douche.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Hạng Bình Dân

review.comment_positive:
et meget hyggeligt sted, med helt fine rum og pænt badeværelse.
de er virkelig gode til at hjælp med ha Giang loop, kæmpe anbefaling bare at booke gennem dem!
the rooms were well equipped and clean , in good walking distance from restaurants .
review.comment_negative:
- property not in original location as stated on booking.com - I think they moved recently.

-walls of the bedrooms are so thin the whole bed shakes when someone is walking around in the room next door to you .

-Had a bad experience with being persuaded to change our motorbike rental to them, they then rented us a bike that had no number plate so we were stopped by the police. I understand this was an unlucky, uncommon thing to happen but due to the owner not coming straight away it meant we had to delay our loop tour by a day . This police stop cost me £30 in phone calls (so the police and hostel could talk on my phone which is English SIM card ) . And we lost about £35 in pre-paid bus tickets . The hostel VERY RELUCTANTLY said they would pay for one of our bus tickets and a free night in the hostel . This was very appreciated however it was not appreciated that I had to repeatedly ask and it created a very awkward exchange . Personally I would go elsewhere to hire a bike . 

Apart from that they are very friendly and helpful with booking you bus tickets or giving you directions.

review.comment_positive: It's cheap and ok if you need to stay just overnight.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom wasn't clean, overall the room looked bad.

review.rating: Merci à Jessica pour notre plus beau moment au Vietnam
review.comment_positive:
la gentillesse de Jessica et de son personnel ! elle
nous a aidé a planifier notre loop ( restos, trajet, logements)
et la moto 125cc manuel était quasi neuve !! 
Jessica parle extrêmement bien anglais donc tres simple 
de communiquer !
Encore une fois merci, nous recommandons grandemebt
ce logement !!
review.comment_negative: rien

review.rating: Top Start für den Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: LiLa Inn ist ein super Start für den Ha Giang Loop. Ob als Tour gebucht oder nur zum Motorrad leihen, man kriegt alle Informationen die man benötigt. Wir waren sehr zufrieden und haben den Loop alleine gemacht (geht nur mit gültigem Führerschein). Würden es immer wieder so machen.
review.comment_negative: Das Zimmer ist okay für eine Nacht, hat aber keinerlei Komfort. Wir haben nach dem Loop nochmal eine Nacht hier verbracht, hat uns also nicht davon abgehalten wieder zu kommen ;-)

review.rating: Great, informative and relaxed stay here
review.comment_positive: very helpful in planning the Ha Giang Loop - they also helped book our bus to go to Ninh Binh and had a room for us to shower and get ready before getting on the bus

Very friendly and helpful staff . Made everything very easy for us with checking in at 3am, booking a bus, renting a motorbike to tour on and storing our luggage.  Decent breakfast and good value for money .
review.comment_negative: Roof leaked a little in heavy rain .

review.comment_positive: We loved everything about our stay at LiLa Inn. Highly recommended.

review.rating: Gorgeous views, welcoming family. My trip was unforgettable thanks to Lila Inn.
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: I’m so grateful that I chose LiLa Inn. I am traveling alone and I was immediately welcomed in by Liem and his family. Liem had amazing recommendations for where to eat and where to stay along the loop. I rented a motorbike from him for 6 days and he helped me plan my trip (I even messaged him along my route and he gave me the best tips). Lila Inn was a great place to start my trip. The beds in the dorms are super comfy and the views from the terrace are phenomenal. Even though this is centrally located, it’s tucked up a side street so it’s remarkably quiet. The showers and bathroom facilities are modern and very clean. I can’t recommend this place enough.
review.comment_negative: I don’t have a single complaint!

review.comment_positive: Liam was extremely helpful planning our trip which was amazing.

We stayed here before starting the Ha Giang loop. The location is brilliant, walking distance from shops and restaurants. All of the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. TheY seemed genuinely happy working there and always had smiles on their faces.The owner Liam went above and beyond to help us arrange tours and his local knowledge was excellent, we really enjoyed chatting with him.
review.comment_negative: There is very little to fault with this lovely inn. The only thing would be the walls in the bedrooms are very thin and not very sound proof.

review.rating: Loved our stay, basic accommodation but amazing host
review.comment_positive: The accommodation is basic but the owner is amazing and organised our motorbiking trip last minute. They have incredible easy-riders who stay at the property which feels like a family. Not many rooms so we had a small grouo doing the Ha Giang loop together, compared to some of the bigger hostels. We loved our stay and trip :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Very clean, bathroom completely renovated, possibility to do late check-in, perfect position for starting the ha giang loop and very friendly and helpful personnel.

The host is very nice and made our stay really good. There are motors and equipment for rent at the accommodation to do the Ha Giang loop and the host talked us through the route and all the highlights, stops and overnight stays. We wished we could stay more nights at your accommodation!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, all very good!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Hạng Bình Dân

review.comment_positive:
excellent petit hôtel, nous sommes restés quatre jours petit déjeuner simple mais excellent.
Le personnel est très gentil et très serviable, ce qui est très appréciable.
Possibilité de faire pas mal de balade.
je recommande, sachant que les chambres sont simples n’est pas très bien isolés
review.comment_negative: Gentillesse du personnel

review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliches und hilfreiches Personal! Wir haben eine 3 Tages Tour für den Ha Giang Loop gebucht, hatten super freundliche und zuvorkommende Fahrer und eine unvergessliche Zeit! Während der Tour haben wir unsere Kamera an einem Stop vergessen. Die Gastgeber vom Lila Inn haben sich direkt darum gekümmert, die Kamera dort am nächsten Tag abgeholt und zu unserer nächsten Unterkunft in Ninh Binh gesendet. Die Unterkunft und vor allem der Service und die Touren sind sehr zu empfehlen!
Nhân viên niềm nở dễ thương
review.comment_negative: Cần nâng cấp thêm hạ tầng

review.comment_positive: Het personeel was zeer vriendelijk. We konden op dezelfde locatie motoren huren voor de loop en kregen ook goed advies over de route die we het beste konden nemen, omdat er aan de weg werd gewerkt. De bedden waren comfortabel en de airco was goed.
review.comment_negative:
De kamers zijn niet echt top. Er is schade aan de vloer en het is erg gehorig. Er zit denk ik houtworm in de houten muur die je hard hoort knagen. Niet alle kamers hebben een raam.
Niet alle motoren zijn even goed onderhouden. Onze scooters hadden minder goede remmen wat de loop moeilijker maakte om te rijden. Goed de remmen controleren voor vertrek is aan te raden!

review.comment_positive: Man konnte Motorräder für den Loop ausleihen und das Gepäck unterstellen.
review.comment_negative: Als erstes, die Adresse auf Booking stimmt nicht, man kann das Hotel nicht finden!!? Die richtige Adresse wird einem kurz vorher per Nachricht mitgeteilt, was nichts bringt wenn man unterwegs kein Internet hat. Das Zimmer bestand nur aus Betten, man konnte sich kaum bewegen. Die Wände sind komplett mit Holz bestückt, nachts hört man wie sich sämtliche Tiere durch das Holz fressen, gruselig. Tür geht nicht richtig zu, man kann von außen rein schauen. Privatsphäre adé. Zum Frühstück gab es nur trockenen Toast mit Ei. Essen gab es vor Ort keines.

review.rating: Friendly, helpful staff and great base to explore from.
review.comment_positive: Great place to stay to kick off for the Ha Giang Loop. Thuan at reception was really helpful with sorting the bikes and making us feel at home. We booked 4 bikes and 2 easy riders, Ming and Ling, with Tien as back up - great team, they were brilliant! decided to stay at Lila on our return as well because it was so easy and nice people.
review.comment_negative: It's a hostel not a 5 star but actually exceeded my expectations.

review.comment_positive: đẹp & sạch sẽ, rất yên tĩnh
review.comment_negative: đường hơi tối thôi, chứ cũng ko có j 🥰

review.comment_positive:
- accueil et personnel super, l’équipe nous a aidé à organiser notre tour autour d’ha giang, on a également loué la moto directement sur place 
- la gérante et son copain sont adorables et feront tout pour vous satisfaire 
- chambre propre 
- hotel très sympa avec un endroit pour se poser

This place is great. They were so accommodating to our specific needs - especially with us getting off the bus at 3:30 AM; they sent us a WhatsApp video on how to easily self check in at such a time. The room was very clean with a nice shower and comfortable bed. We rented very good motorbikes and they had all the protective gear. Highly recommend!
Ấm đun nước siêu tốc trong phòng hoạt động tốt. Khá tiện để pha trà.

review.rating: Excellent rapport qualité prix et patronne formidable
review.comment_positive:
excellent séjour dans ce petit hôtel, la patronne « Lan » est absolument incroyable, elle a tout fait pour faciliter notre séjour, et nous organiser la loop dans les meilleurs conditions ! Les chambres sont propres c’est un excellent rapport qualité prix.
Je recommande vivement
Nước trong phòng tắm chảy đều, khá mạnh. Gia đình tôi thấy thoải mái.
Nhìn chung, một kỳ nghỉ tốt. Sẽ cân nhắc cho lần sau.
mặc dù bọn mình đến nơi khá muộn nhưng chị chủ vẫn tiếp đón rất nhiệt tình, chu đáo. Mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời. phòng ở Hà Giang nhưng lại cho mình cảm giác như ở Đà Lạt vậy, chill lắm nha

We stayed at LiLa Inn as starting point for our motorbike tour on the Ha Giang Loop. We conveniently rented good motorbikes from LiLa Inn, were helped with the booking of the night bus and could also take a shower before heading back to Hanoi. Friendly hosts and great value for money!
En general bien, salvo el ruido de la calle
L'accueil et l'aide du personnel pour organiser notre Ha Giang loop. Ils nous ont permis de louer une 150cc et d'avoir de bons équipements. Bon petit déjeuner.

review.rating: Good place to get set up for Ha Giang Loop.
review.comment_positive:
The staff here are great. Lots of communication before our arrival and a nice welcome. 
We hired biked from them at a fair price and they were good bikes. 
The rooms are good, bed is reasonably soft and bathrooms nice. The place is quite old and they will be going into a new building which is great.
Overall the staff made this our home away from home in Ha Giang.
review.comment_negative: It is a bit old and run down but once the new premises are ready then that won’t be an issue.

review.rating: We stayed at Lila Inn one night before our Ha Giang loop tour. Great hostel with great facilities. Staff were super help

review.comment_positive: Dinner was amazing, we rented a motorbike off them for 10 days, it worked perfectly the whole trip and they were really helpful, showing us secret spots, different routes… totally recommend this place if you’re doing the Ha Giang loop!

review.rating: The best! Very satisfied with our experience
review.comment_positive: Staff were very accommodating and great at providing information on the Ha Giang loop. We rented a 150cc manual bike from here too and it performed like a dream. Cant recommend enough.
review.comment_negative: no complaints!
